metadata.title: CVE-2016-3733 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The "restore teacher" feature in Moodle 3.0 through 3.0.3, 2.9 through2.9.5, 2.8 through 2.8.11, 2.7 through 2.7.13, and earlier allows remoteauthenticated users to overwrite the course idnumber.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3733` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 3.0.3+dfsg-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.3+dfsg-0ubuntu1').
